description_text: Fox News is seeking an Android Developer to assist with maintaining the Fox News and Fox Business mobile and OTT apps. We're looking for someone who is proficient at coding in Java and Kotlin and adheres to best practices to ensure delivery of stable and reliable app releases. You will have the opportunity to solve challenging technical problems and maintain good communication with other developers and stakeholders. In addition to programming, you will assist with maintaining CI/CD workflows, improving testing solutions, and optimizing the overall development process. < / p >< p >< /p >< p >< b > A SNAPSHOT OF YOUR RESPONSIBILITIES < / b >< /p >< ul >< li >< p > Develop features for the Fox News and Fox Business mobile and OTT apps < /p> < li >< p > Document code in a clear and concise manner < /p> < li >< p > Identify and address technical debt < /p>undefined< li >< p > Monitor and improve app performance < /p>undefined< li >< p > Review and approve code changes from other developers < /p>undefined< li >< p > Collaborate with cross - functional teams to define and ship new features < /p>undefined< /ul>undefined

description_text: Looking to join a fast-growing, cutting edge technology company serving customers nationwide? Look no further! TownNews.com, the premier internet hosting provider for media companies in the broadcast and newspaper industry, seeks a seasoned mobile developer to join our team. You will work closely with a small team developing mobile applications for over a hundred customers.
requirement_text: <div> <ul> <li> Experience developing native iOS applications written in Swift using the latest versions of the Xcode < /li> <li> Experience developing native Android applications written in Java using the latest versions of the Android Studio < /li> <li> Experience working with Git source code management and development collaboration tools for issue tracking and requirements documentation < /li> <li> Knowledge of Android SDK(Jetpack, Webkit, Gradle, ConstraintLayout), different versions of Android, and how to deal with different screen sizes < /li> <li> Knowledge of iOS SDK(UIKit, WebKit, AVFoundation, AutoLayout), and how to deal with different screen sizes < /li> <li> Knowledge of RESTful APIs to connect mobile applications to back - end services < /li> <li> Familiarity with push notifications < /li> <li> Familiarity with Deep Linking / App Linking < /li> <li> Familiarity of Google Mobile Ads < /li> </ul >< ul >< li > 3 years of professional work experience specialized in mobile development < /li> <li> Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Swift / Java code < /li> <li> Help maintain code quality, organization, and automation < /li> <li> Work with product managers and other stake holders to provide technical requirements < /li> <li> Troubleshoot and fix software defects using an issue tracking system < /li> <li> Perform code reviews with other developers < /li> </ul >< /div>

description_text:
The U-Haul Mobile team is looking for an Android developer responsible for the development and maintenance of both enterprise and customer-facing applications. Our company has multiple lines of business within the moving marketplace including truck rentals, car sharing, Moving Help, and retail items to name a few. Our challenge? Develop mobile applications that make our customer's experience with our services as remarkable as possible and support our internal business needs. Do you have the development capabilities to succeed at this task?
< / p >< p >< /p >< p >< b > Responsibilities < / b >< /p >< p > â€¢Participate in the full mobile application development lifecycle. < / p >< p > â€¢Develop, test, and deploy user interface, service tier, and data tier components for complex mobile applications. < /p>

â€¢ Code, debug, test, and maintain applications to meet requirements. < / p >< p > â€¢Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application. < /p>

â€¢ Maintain, support, troubleshoot, monitor and optimize mobile applications. < / p >< p > â€¢Work with other U - Haul IT teams to design and implement quality software solutions. < /p>

â€¢ Conduct peer reviews of team members â€™ code.
< / p >< /div >
requirement_text:
Skills < / b >< /p >< p > â€¢At least 3 + years of Android development experience and knowledge of the following: < / p >< p > â€¢High proficiency in Java or Kotlin. < / p >< p > â€¢Experience and understanding of the entire Mobile SDLC using Android SDK. < /p>

â€¢ Experience writing Native Android applications. < / p >< p > â€¢Good working knowledge of networks and security thereof. < /p>

â€¢ S trong knowledge of: activities, fragments, collections, multithreading, networking, profiling, performance tuning, and offline storage. < / p >< p > â€¢Debugging and problem - solving skills. < /p>

â€¢ Solid experience with OOP and design patterns, such as MVVM, MVC, Strategy, etc. < / p >< p > â€¢Knowledge of Android networking and REST / JSON / XML Web Services and integration with 3 rd party libraries and APIs. < /p>

â€¢ Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks. < / p >< p > â€¢Ability to work in a Git - based Continuous Integration(CI) environment. < br >< /p>

< p > You will be successful in this role if you: < /p>

â€¢ Complete daily development assignments that include internal and external mobile applications. < / p >< p > â€¢Analyze and implement solutions to presented problems while satisfying the user 's needs. < / p >< p > â€¢Write code that is easily maintainable and highly reliable. < /p>

â€¢ Possess the ability to multitask and prioritize work as necessary. < / p >< p > â€¢Collaborate with a team to successfully complete projects on time. < br >< /p>

description_text:
Our mission is to defend human rights and democracy through building software that is essential for digital freedom and privacy protection for all Internet users.

< p > ProtonMail was founded in 2014 by a group of scientists who met at the European Organization for Nuclear Research(CERN).And since its inception, the company has grown at a fast pace and today has over 26 million users.Our principal product, < b > ProtonMail < /b>, is the worldâ€™s largest secure email service. Our second product, ProtonVPN , is one of the worldâ€™ s most popular VPN services.Our vision is to build an Internet platform for the protection of digital rights, and we are also developing additional products such as < b > ProtonCalendar, < /b> ProtonDrive , and much more. < /p>

Proton users include leaders of the Hong Kong protest movement, New York Times journalists, some of the worldâ€™ s largest corporations, and millions of ordinary citizens from over 180 countries.Our team is diverse and dynamic, representing over 30 different nationalities, with offices in Geneva, Zurich, Prague, Vilnius, Skopje, San Francisco, and Taipei. < /p>
< p > < /p>

What You will do: < /b>

< p > You will contribute to the development effort for existing and future ProtonMail and ProtonVPN for Android devices.This includes interacting with our existing backend REST APIs, providing feedback based on mobile needs, and working with our web, backend, and server teams to build new features.You will also coordinate with our QA / Support team to analyze our Android apps and assist with debugging them. < br > < /p> < / div >
requirement_text:
• 8+ years of experience in software development (with a strong command of OOP, data structures and algorithms) of which at least 5 years of extensive Android development
    • < li > Fluent with Java and Kotlin and Coroutines < /li> < li > Excellent knowledge of multithreading < /li> < li > Knowledge of latest trends and libraries in Android ecosystem < /li> < li > Working knowledge of RESTful web APIs and complex systems < /li> < li > Knowledge of Git or other source control < /li> < li > Experience with automated testing, Continuous Integration and Development < /li>

description_text:
< div > Hive is a full stack deep learning platform helping to bring companies into the AI era. < /div>
< br > < div > Two Stanford graduate students determined to build practical applications using novel deep learning technologies founded < b > Hive < /b>(https:/ / thehive.ai / ).From the beginning, we knew that high - quality datasets were critical to creating deep learning models.However, we also knew that the quantity of labeled data also has a huge impact on model performance.With this in mind, we first started by building a data - labelling platform specifically designed to solve machine - learning problems.This platform, < b > Hive Data < /b>, is now the worldâ€™s largest distributed human workforce for data labelling and produces millions of high-quality annotations every day. Hive Data allows us to label uncommonly large datasets at a fraction of the cost that other data labelling solutions would charge. Once Hive Data was built, we were able to quickly label enormous datasets and rapidly build a suite of machine learning models that now form our core offerings in Hive Predict.
< div > Our < b > Hive Predict < /b>team has since built a wide range of custom machine learning models spanning a range of verticals including media, retail, security, and autonomous driving. Drawing on this experience and expertise, we then set out to build a stand-alone analytics platform for TV advertising called Hive Media .Hive Media synthesises our company 's fundamental technologies and leverages industry partnerships to deliver a truly revolutionary product. Hive offers the only true, full- stack deep learning platform in the world, assisting clients with data labelling, model building, and the development of full enterprise solutions.
Today, we work with some of the largest companies in the world to redefine how they think about unstructured visual data and together we build solutions that completely transform verticals.We are fortunate to be funded by leading investors like Peter Thiel(Founders Fund), General Catalyst, Formation 8, and others.We have over 160 talented individuals globally, based in our San Francisco and Gurugram offices. < /div>
< br > < div > In order to execute our vision, we need to grow our team of best - in -class engineers.We are looking for talented < b > Android developers < /b>who will thrive in an autonomous engineering-driven environment. You will take ownership of a product and have the ability to shape product direction.
< /div>
< div > < ul > < li > Design and develop a delightful Android application for our users, with a focus on simplicity of use and high - performance < /li>
  • Write product - independent code and design modular APIs to be used across all of our products < /li>
  • Work across disciplines with team members from front - end, backend, design, and product < /li>
  • Help ensure weâ€™ re bug - free by writing unit - tests, and regularly communicating with our QA team < /li>
  • Actively participate in product decisions, ensuring we set reasonable development deadlines < /li> < /div>
    • < /div> < / div >

description_text:
National Information Solutions Cooperative (NISC) is an information technology company that develops and supports software and hardware solutions for our Member/Owners who are primarily utility and telecommunications cooperatives and companies across the nation. NISC is an industry leader providing advanced, integrated IT solutions for consumer and subscriber billing, accounting, engineering and operations, as well as many other leading-edge IT solutions. NISC is ranked in ComputerWorld's Best Places to Work survey for fifteen consecutive years.

< p > < b > Primary Responsibilities: < /b>

< p > NISC is looking for passionate Android Mobile Developers to add to our team and push our native applications to their fullest potential.This application developer will work with our talented software engineers to design, build and evolve our mobile application suite.This position will work closely with our product, quality assurance and support staff to ensure quality and functionality requirements are met. < /p> < p > < b > Essential Functions: < /b>

< ul > < li > Design and build native applications for the Android platform < /li> < li > Collaborate with cross - functional teams to research, design and implement new features. < /li> < li > Research, analyze, and resolve moderately complex customer issues and bugs. < /li> < li > Unit test and integration test code as needed. < /li> < li > Follow all established software development methodologies and procedures. < /li> < / ul > < /div>
requirement_text: < li > 2 + years industry experience < /li> < li > Extensive Java Experience < /li> < li > Strong understanding of Android development environment, tools and best practices < /li> < li > Strong understanding of Computer Science concepts < /li> < li > Ability to work within a team with mixed levels of engineers < /li> < li > Strong design skills and understanding of OO concepts < /li> < li > Strong knowledge / understanding of multithreading < /li> < li > Experience in leadership or mentoring roles a plus < /li> < li > BS / MS in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related. < /li> < / ul >

description_text:
We are providing visa sponsorship for OPT and H1 candidates in coming April.

Opportunity Overview: < /b>

< p > WINTrio is a leading provider of cloud managed services, agile software development, DevOps, systems engineering, IT service management and risk analytics.We work collaboratively with our federal and commercial customers to solve their biggest challenges through a commitment to delivering innovation, agility, and maximum value.Our team members are empowered to think outside of the box and provide innovative solutions to our customers and provide measurable cost saving. < /p>

It is a 5 - year project with a large client in completely DevOps / DevSecOps arena with the < b > latest and greatest tools < /b> and technologies for folks to broaden their skills set. The stability, growth, and flexibility are the key benefits provided with this opportunity.The project is the backbone for our client providing all cloud and DevOps / DevSecOps type services with the latest and greatest toolsâ€¦ not a routine job or a contract.It is probably < b > one of the few organizations like Amazon, Netflix, and Google implementing a true DevOps / DevSecOps culture < /b> and transforming the way business is done.

< /div>
